data.message: Eminem hey i had 2 go pick up 2 groups  the last 1 was mess up....but it's cool we work threw it...now with all that said i was talking the game of life. not the game from the west cost i love him ..i saw him play sincity and he was with snoop they only sold out half i was like wtf ..then snoop said he had some Alabama in the dressing room ..i was like no way.. Eminem u don't know noting bout no Alabama ...u should work on learning how to love slim now. i know we had or differences but i am will 2 put that a side 4 now u know with the whole u trying 2 sublimenate me  i forgive u....u shout hang out with love...and take notes slim u need 2 be righting this down ....now u ain't fooling me with the tuff guy shit ...u still love her. now if u need me to help u get your woman back i will ...we can sit down and talk it out...slim if nobody told u they love u today i love ok..just do the right thing. 1 love souljer carry on. u need 2 be more like this guy slim Brandon Kutchera he has a positive message...
